row.right: Built just for WordPress with personalized tweaks from our WordPress experts for maximum performance.
We distribute web requests across multiple servers so the same amount of work gets done faster and can handle spikes in traffic. And if there's a problem withone server, your site won't be affected.

row.left: Massively redundantly SSD-backed file and database servers
row.right: Your website content, database and admin load blazing fast with high performace disk servers. Get superior I/O rates and disk access times.
Your website is enhanced with multiple caching layers for millisecond load times.

row.left: Nightly backups with a 30 day retention time and free restores

row.right: We've added protection from suspicious bots that like to crawl your site and blast the backend with pointless requests.
Enhanced perimeter protection, with fail-safe to keep traffic flowing should a firewall router fail.
Increased availability, and keeps traffic flowing during one of the most common attacks.
We monitor and mitigate the network and systems against malicious activity.

row.left: Black list for known malicious plugins
row.right: To help keep WordPress accounts secure as possible, we blacklist plugins known to cause security and performance issues.

row.left: Brute force login and comment spam prevention.
row.right: Added security layers to prevent hackers from stealing login credentials, and flooding "comments" with spam.
Our automatic updates make sure you're always running the latest version of WordPress to reduce vulnerabilities, and stay safe from hackers.
Securely access and manage files on remote file systems. Encrypt commands and data to prevent passwords and sensitive information from being transmitted unprotected over a network.

row.left: No set up. We do it for you.
row.right: You're ready to start building your site in 30 seconds or less.
Includes over 30 popular plugins to supercharge your site with stats, contact forms, search boxes and more.
Build your site on the free domain included with our annual plan or start with a temporary domain and decide on the perfect URL later.
